definitions.definition: A solid disk or cylinder that fits inside a hollow cylinder, and moves under pressure (as in an engine ) or displaces fluid (as in a pump )
A valve device in some brass instruments for changing the pitch

main_definition: ( mechanics ) A solid disk or cylinder that fits inside a hollow cylinder, and moves under pressure (as in an engine ) or displaces fluid (as in a pump )
secondary_definitions: ( music ) A valve device in some brass instruments for changing the pitch
